definitions.text: be present at (meetings, church services, university), etc.
examples: I rarely attend services at my church
did you go to the meeting?

definitions.text: take charge of or deal with
examples: I must attend to this matter
She took care of this business

definitions.text: to accompany as a circumstance or follow as a result
examples: Menuhin's playing was attended by a 15-minute standing ovation

definitions.text: work for or be a servant to
examples: She attends the old lady in the wheelchair
Can you wait on our table, please?
The minister served the King for many years
The children in the audience attended the recital quietly
She hung on his every word
They attended to everything he said
